data.description: Implementation of the classical Bingo game
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Well the Games::* name-space are missing many of the classic games,
    which are fun to implement in Perl.

    I had fun time implementing Games::Bingo and I have several ideas
    and I have received suggestions for improvements and other small
    projects involving the Games:.Bingo core modules, such as:

    A CamelBones frontend (implemented) A Tk frontend A Bingo bot
